name: Princess
descriptions: Princess (real name Angela) is a girl in Little Lamplight in 2277. She guards the back gate.

She gained her nickname when she appointed herself mayor of Lamplight and insisted that everyone call her "Princess.‚Äù However, after only five minutes, MacCready punched her in the nose and took over as the new mayor. Ever since then, she has had a crush on him.

topics.response_text: Hey mungo. This is an A B conversation so C your way out.{"mungo" said with derision}
Good! Glad we've got that settled. Stay out of my way, and there won't be any problems.

topics.topic_text: Did you just try to give me orders? That's cute, little Princess.
topics.response_text: Oh, you'll listen to me. Otherwise, I'll have my good pal RJ kick you out of the town. Or better yet, lock you in the vault.

topics.topic_text: What's it like, guarding the back gate?
topics.response_text: It's so dull! Practically nothing ever tries to come through the back gate anymore, so I never get to shoot anyone.

topics.topic_text: What do you know about Vault 87?
topics.response_text: That's behind the Back Door! The Back Door is my job, and I do it really well!{beaming}

topics.topic_text: I want to use Murder Pass to reach Vault 87.
topics.response_text: Not unless Mayor says it's okay. You'd better ask him.

topics.topic_text: How did someone like you get a nickname like Princess?
topics.response_text: I don't need to explain myself to you, mungo. Shut up and get lost.{Unexpectedly angry at the mention of her nickname}

topics.topic_text: I know why you're really called Princess, Princess.
topics.response_text: Why? Because I'm the Princess of Little Lamplight?{Bluffing, but a little too flustered to pull it off believably.}

topics.topic_text: You don't have to be embarrassed by it. Not everyone can be a good mayor.
topics.response_text: Shut up! Soon as I figure out who told you, someone's getting pounded into the ground.

topics.topic_text: I hear MacCready really walloped you when you tried to play princess.
topics.response_text: Oh yeah? Well that was a long time ago! Now RJ's my best friend!{Surprisingly defensive and angry about the idea that RJ (MacCready) walloped her.}

topics.topic_text: You know what? Never mind. It's not worth making you cry.
Yeah, well... You're a jerk and MacCready doesn't like you.
topics.response_text: Oh, sure, like I should believe you. Why are you even wasting your time over here?{Angry and hurt}

topics.topic_text: I hear MacCready really put you where you belong  at his feet.
topics.response_text: That isn't so! I just... didn't want to do it anymore, and...{Breaking into tears}

topics.topic_text: Why would you have shot at me?
topics.response_text: Could've been a lot of reasons. Maybe you sounded like a monster in all that darkness.

topics.topic_text: Shooting at me would have been a big mistake, kid.
topics.response_text: Oh, really? That's a cute little imagination you've got.

conversation.topic_text: I'm leaving. Get back to guarding.
conversation.response_text: Oh, thank goodness you gave me permission. Jerk.{Dripping with sarcasm.}
Come on, start something again. I dare you. I double dog dare you.
Hey, squirt! Hey, look at me when I talk to you.
If you don't get me a new gun next time you're topside, I'm gonna pound you so hard you'll get another inch shorter.
Is that it? Thanks for wasting my time, Knock Knock.
All's clear on the back gate, RJ. No trouble, no action, no nothing. Most incredibly fucking boring job ever.
Get out of here, dummy!{Angry and frustrated}
Hrmf. What're you so happy about?{dismissive}
What do you think? Get out of my face!{Sarcastic: "What do YOU think?"}
Hrmf. What have you got to be happy about?{dismissive}
Just talking to morons who keep bugging me. Scram!
